img_above_text:
![Wukong Fright 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5e/Wukong_Fright_8.jpg)
If you head left first, you’ll find a small pathway where a Bladebone will spew projectiles at you from a scaffold you can’t reach, but you can duck into and find a green Wisp to absorb in a small room.
img_below_text:
Head past the ranged attacker above (note the Aged Ginseng on the left is actually a Ginsengling), and go through a doorway to spy a large cave entrance up ahead. Stick to the right to find a sloping path back, and a new stony enemy variant will burrow out of the ground.
![Wukong Fright 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f0/Wukong_Fright_10.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

If you head left first, you’ll find a small pathway where a Bladebone will spew projectiles at you from a scaffold you can’t reach, but you can duck into and find a green Wisp to absorb in a small room."
            - Following Text: "Head past the ranged attacker above (note the Aged Ginseng on the left is actually a Ginsengling), and go through a doorway to spy a large cave entrance up ahead. Stick to the right to find a sloping path back, and a new stony enemy variant will burrow out of the ground.
![Wukong Fright 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f0/Wukong_Fright_10.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts the player character in *Black Myth: Wukong* engaging with a stony enemy variant in a rugged, grassy area near rocky cliffs. The enemy is emerging from the ground, suggesting an ambush scenario. The player appears ready to confront the creature, with visible UI elements showing health, abilities, and inventory.

2. **Narrative Role**:  
The image illustrates a key moment in the walkthrough where the player encounters a new stony enemy variant after navigating past a ranged attacker and finding a sloping path. It highlights the game's environmental design and enemy behavior, emphasizing exploration and combat challenges in the cave-like area.
